text: Pius Joseph Malip (died 21 November 1988) was a Papua New Guinean politician. He served as a member of the National Parliament from 1987 to 1988. ==Biography== Malip contested the Ambunti-Dreikikir Open constituency in the 1987 general elections as an independent candidate and was elected to the National Parliament, defeating the incumbent MP Asimboro Ston.Papua New Guinea Election Results 1972 – 2012 Development Policy Centre However, he died in Port Moresby on 21 November 1988 following a car accident.Transition Pacific Islands Monthly, December 1988, p47 ==References== Category:Members of the National Parliament of Papua New Guinea Category:1988 deaths
title: Pius Malip
